To hit 'em harder
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A billboard illustrating a soldier aiming his rifle and advertising a war loan drive is located in a room full of signs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Billboards; Signs; Soldiers; War bonds and funds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Roll 320-34; 9-20-1944; Billboard in Oak Ridge Area
